comments:

This was caused because of:
199595: [pde viz] Fisheye nodes are left on the screen
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=199595

I know get rid of the fisheye figures when the node is disposed, so this should *hopefully* clear this up :)

Let me know if it comes back.
